casebody.data:
[L. A. No. 11927. In Bank. February 21,1930.] GERTRUDE HOWE, Petitioner, v. MUNICIPAL COURT OF THE CITY OF LOS ANGELES, etc., et al„ Respondents.

Max Lewis and Gerald R. Edgington for Petitioner.

Lloyd S. Nix, City Prosecutor, and Joe W. Matherly and F. W. Fellows, Deputies City Prosecutor, for Respondents.

THE COURT.-

— Upon the authority of Hansen v. Municipal Court, 208 Cal. 506 [282 Pac. 384], and Keaton v. Municipal Court (L. A. No. 11849), ante, p. 52 [285 Pac. 696], this day decided, we are of the opinion that the peremptory writ of mandate should be issued as prayed for, and it is so ordered.
